title: The Real BNP
name: The Real BNP
description:
A Map by Betterbritain

Pinpointing the locations of the criminal and downright dodgy antics which members of the British National Party have got up to recently. And these fools call themselves the party of law and order?!

Want a better Britain? Fight the BNP.

properties.name: Chesterfield cowardly woman beater
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainGraham Tasker Position: Branch organiser for Chesterfield. Criminal record: 1989 - Six months custody for an attack on a black woman. 1993 - Convicted of violent disorder for an attack on a Mansfield solicitor. Far right links: 1992 - Active in the Ku Klux Klan, burning crosses in the Derbyshire countryside. 1992-1993 - Activist with C18 both in the East Midlands and in London.

properties.name: County Durham violent criminal
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainPaul Thompson Position: Branch organiser for County Durham February 2001 - Attended a meeting of the American Friends of the BNP. Criminal record 1994 - Found guilty of criminal damage after participating in an attack with C18 activists in Durham. Sentenced to a year\'s conditional discharge and made to pay Â£237 compensation. July 1998 - Convicted for violence and jailed for six months. Football July 1998 - Convicted for violence after attacking football fans in Darlington town centre.

properties.name: Coventry Hitler worshipper
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainMark Matthews originally known as Mark Payne Position: Branch organiser for Coventry. Far right links: Runs Fourteen Words (UK), a nazi bookclub set up in the memory of Robert J. Matthews, the US nazi terrorist who was killed in a shootout with the FBI in 1984. He signs letters 88 - for Heil Hitler.His PO Box is used for the West Midlands chapter of Blood and Honour, Britain\'s nazi skinhead group.

properties.name: East End National Fronter
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainDave Hill Position: Branch organiser for the East End of London, London co-ordinator of F.A.I.R. - Families against Immigrant Racism. Became active in the BNP in the mid-1990s Far right links: 1997-1999 - Active in National Front. He attended NF anti-refugee demonstrations in Dover. Attended a NF protest demo against the 1998 Bloody Sunday demo along Holloway Road. Has links to the British Ulster Alliance, a London-based support group for the Ulster Defence Association.

properties.name: East Midlands disorderly nazi
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainStephen Belshaw Position: Regional organiser for the East Midlands Criminal record: 1993 - Convicted of violent disorder for an attack on a Mansfield solicitor. Far right links: 1992 and 1993 - C18 activist.

properties.name: Edinburgh Holocaust denier
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainWarren Bennett Position: Chief Steward and branch organiser for Edinburgh Criminal record 1990 - Conviction for public disorder. Was among 58 Scottish supporters prevented from attending the Scotland match with Norway in Bordeaux, France during the 1998 World Cup. Scottish and French police feared they would commit violence. The group had been followed by police from Spain. Far right links: 1992-5 - Attended several C18 events in London, including protection of David Irving meetings (1992) and Loyalist parades (March 1995).

properties.name: Finsbury Park shooter
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainJohn Laidlaw, a member of the fascist British National Party (BNP) who wanted to "kill all black people" has been jailed for a life for a shooting spree in north London.

properties.name: Gateshead threatening convict
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainKevin Scott, the North East BNP organiser, has convictions for assault and threatening behaviour. He also appears to be illiterate (see link).

properties.name: Hereford terrorist
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainLambertus Nieuwhof, a South African white supremacist, tried to bomb the Calvary church school in Nelspuit in 1992.

properties.name: Hull anti-semite
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainDavid Hannam Position: Branch organiser for Hull Criminal record: 2000 - Three months custody for his part in the production and distribution of a racist and anti-Semitic leaflet during the 1999 European election campaign.

properties.name: Keighley, anti-semite, Holocaust denier, convict.
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainNick Griffin, the BNP leader, stood in Keighley in 2005.

properties.name: Kidderminster wife beater and criminals
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainDavid Enderby, BNP councillor for Redditch, was found guilty of three counts of assault (for his thuggery and wife-beating): http://82.69.12.18/lancasteruafblog/index.php?itemid=704 ). His election agent Kevin Hughes was jailed for racially aggravated common assault. http://82.69.12.18/lancasteruafblog/index.php?itemid=448

properties.name: Leeds serial assaulter
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainTony McDonnell Position: Branch organiser for Leeds and part of the BNP\'s security team at the "Red, White and Blue" event. Criminal record: Five convictions including: 1988 - Actual Bodily Harm 1989 - Grievous Bodily Harm 1998 - Assaulting a police officer and failing to provide a breath test.

properties.name: Liverpool thug
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainJOSEPH Owens, British National Party candidate for Liverpool served eight months in jail for sending razor blades in the post to members of the city\'s Jewish community in 1982. He was also convicted and jailed in 1994 for carrying CS gas and knuckle dusters when he worked as a clubland bouncer. And in 1998 he was charged with the contract murder of 33-year-old nightclub security boss George Bromley - but the charge was dropped due to lack of evidence before the case went to trial.

properties.name: London nailbomber
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainDavid Copeland, who\'d been a member of the BNP, detonated 3 nailbombs in London. He murdered three and injured several others.

properties.name: Manchester fascist Franco fan
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainAllan Payne Position: Branch organiser for Manchester and Salford Far right links: 1987 - Admitted to an undercover newspaper reporter that he was involved in a plot to kidnap Viraj Mendis, a Sri Lankan anti-racist, who was fighting a Home Office deportation order. 1990 - Exposed in an undercover newspaper report for distributing 10,000 copies of Holocaust News, a newssheet that denied the Holocaust occurred. November 2000 - travelled to Spain to celebrate the birth of Spanish fascist dictator, General Franco.

properties.name: Newcastle convict
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainKevin Scott Position: Regional organiser for the North East and branch organiser for Newcastle Criminal record 1987 - Conviction for assault. 1993 - Conviction for using threatening words and behaviour. Far right links: 2001 - Wrote an article in the International Third Position newspaper, "The Final Conflict".

properties.name: Oldham convicted gang rapist
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainRobert Bennett. A leading activist in Oldham BNP during the 2002 elections campaign, Bennett has served five years in prison for the gang rape of a teenager. He has also served seven years for armed robbery and has over 30 convictions in total.

properties.name: Oldham thief and fence
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainMick Treacy Position: Branch organiser for Oldham. Criminal record: Has five convictions including handling stolen goods, deception, theft from an employer and public order.

properties.name: Preston chemical explosive hoarders
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainRobert Cottage, a BNP candidate in Colne in 2005, and David Jackson, a dentist from Nelson, Lancashire were charged with possessing explosives at Preston Crown Court.

properties.name: South East London drug user and swastika wearer
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainColin Smith Position: Regional organiser for South East London Criminal record Has multiple convictions, including possession of an offensive weapon, driving whilst disqualified, and possession of a controlled drug. Far right links Involved in far right politics since the early 1980s. Ex-member of the openly nazi British Movement before leaving to join the BNP in the early 1990s. 1981 - photographed wearing a British Movement jacket with a swastika armband at a British Movement rally.

properties.name: Swindon firebomber
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainRacist firebomber Mark Bulman has been jailed for five years after trying to torch the Broad Street [Swindon] mosque. The 22-year-old used a British National Party leaflet as a fuse in a petrol-filled beer bottle which he hurled through a window at the place of worship. Want a better Britain? Fight this bunch of thugs.

properties.name: Ulster petrol bomber
properties.description: Posted by BetterbritainAndy McLorie Position: Regional organiser for Ulster Criminal record: 1986 - Sentenced to two years in jail following a petrol bomb attack on the home of an RUC officer. Far right links: 1980s - The National Front Ulster organiser.
